description: I got everything to work and the audio and video were quite good, but no matter what I tried to do to set the window or the area I wanted to record on my secondary large screen, the video always cut edges. When I tried to compensate for the cuts by expanding one side or the other, it would do the opposite of what was expected. After several hours I gave up and chose another application, which has worked flawlessly.
summary: not recommended at all for a multi-screen system
